When enabled, SharedLibraryLoader exceptions will be printed to the Configuration.DEBUG_STREAM.
DEBUG_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR - Static variable in class org.lwjgl.system.Configuration
Set to true to enable LWJGL's debug mode for the MemoryUtil explicit memory management API (memAlloc/memFree/etc).
DEBUG_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR_FAST - Static variable in class org.lwjgl.system.Configuration
Set to true to skip stacktrace generation on each tracked allocation.
DEBUG_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR_INTERNAL - Static variable in class org.lwjgl.system.Configuration
Set to false to disable tracking of internal memory allocations, in native shared libraries that have been set up to use the LWJGL memory allocator.

Set to true to enable LWJGL's debug mode for the MemoryStack.

Can be set to override the default APIUtil.DEBUG_STREAM.

descriptorCount() - Method in class org.lwjgl.vulkan.VkDescriptorSetLayoutBinding.Buffer
 
descriptorCount() - Method in class org.lwjgl.vulkan.VkDescriptorSetLayoutBinding
the number of descriptors contained in the binding, accessed in a shader as an array, except if descriptorType is DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_INLINE_UNIFORM_BLOCK in which case descriptorCount is the size in bytes of the inline uniform block.

DISPLAY_DEVICE - Class in org.lwjgl.system.windows
Receives information about the display device specified by the iDevNum parameter of the User32.EnumDisplayDevices(java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, org.lwjgl.system.windows.DISPLAY_DEVICE, int) function.
DISPLAY_DEVICE(ByteBuffer) - Constructor for class org.lwjgl.system.windows.DISPLAY_DEVICE
Creates a DISPLAY_DEVICE instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container.

dynamicPrimitiveTopologyUnrestricted() - Method in class org.lwjgl.vulkan.VkPhysicalDeviceExtendedDynamicState3PropertiesEXT
